net.edzard.kinetic

Class LinearGradientFillStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edzard.kinetic.GradientFillStyle
      • net.edzard.kinetic.LinearGradientFillStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FillStyle
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RadialGradientFillStyle

    public class LinearGradientFillStyle
extends GradientFillStyle
    A linear gradient fill style. The liner gradient is filled from a start to an end position. Along this line, so-called "colour stops" can be set, which influence how the colour is changed along the gradient. For example: Setting a colour stop with black at start position and a colour stop with white at the end position will lead to a gradient which goes through all shades of grey. They can be more than two colour stops assigned to a gradient.
    Author:
    Ed
